title: King of Perspective Vision - Novel Updates

description:
An well-to-do, average otaku opened his perspective eye. Since then, his life changed and turned it around. Stone gambling…. Treasure appraisal…. Treating illnesses… The urban city was his for the taking. The best lolis… Mature onee-sans…. Ice Cold Goddesses… Pure School Flower Beauties…. Peerless Beauties… They came one after another.
